Too Many Tentacles.name: Too Many Tentacles
Too Many Tentacles.desc: Have a stack fo exactly 10,000,000 Wriggly Balls in your Storage Chest. Green Stack bro!

Michelin Ranked.name: Michelin Ranked
Michelin Ranked.desc: Upgrade any kitchen stat to Lv. 300, giving you an elite crown over the upgrade bars, thus resulting in dopamine.

Stars Among Stars.name: Stars Among Stars
Stars Among Stars.desc: Complete all constellations in the Hyperion Nebula. Thats what world 4 is called btw.

Zero G Scorin'.name: Zero G Scorin'
Zero G Scorin'.desc: Get a Score of 10,000,000 or more in the Astro Colosseum

Mythical Gamer.name: Mythical Gamer
Mythical Gamer.desc: Reach level 125 on any character! This used to be a HUGE deal, now it's just a big deal.

Le Pretzel Bleu.name: Le Pretzel Bleu
Le Pretzel Bleu.desc: Have 8 kitchens all cooking Pretzels at the same time. Don't get it twisted, them pretzels are the real deal.

Mutant Massacrer.name: Mutant Massacrer
Mutant Massacrer.desc: Defeat both Mutant Minibosses, the W3 Slush and W4 Mush. You must defeat Slush before Mush, in that order.
Mutant Massacrer.rewards: *STEAM EXCLUSIVE &*RNG item unlock &*Some Gems and Candy

Hunned Times a Day.name: Hunned Times a Day
Hunned Times a Day.desc: Claim spices by any means 10,000 times. Like, individual claims.

Bland Dish.name: Bland Dish
Bland Dish.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ What exactly were you expecting to cook, an invisible meal?

Chippin' Away.name: Chippin' Away
Chippin' Away.desc: Claim 25 chips from the Chip Repository. I was gonna make this 250 chips, but people from the future told me not to.

Great Plate.name: Great Plate
Great Plate.desc: Upgrade a meal at the Dinner Menu to the point where it gets a purple plate!

Bottle Capital.name: Bottle Capital
Bottle Capital.desc: Have a stack of exactly 800,000 Bottle Caps in your Storage Chest.

Good Plate.name: Good Plate
Good Plate.desc: Upgrade a meal at the Dinner Menu to the point where it gets a diamond plate!

Space Party!!!.name: Space Party!!!
Space Party!!!.desc: Dance with at least 5 other people while you're all in World 4 town!

Hibernating Gamer.name: Hibernating Gamer
Hibernating Gamer.desc: Glaim 110,000 hours of AFK time. Jeez, thats like an entire year of all characters idling to the max.

Milky Wayfarer.name: Milky Wayfarer
Milky Wayfarer.desc: Reach World 4, the purple one with outer space stuff!
Milky Wayfarer.rewards: *STEAM EXCLUSIVE &*RNG item unlock &*Some Gems and Candy

Lv. 5 Nothing.name: Lv. 5 Nothing
Lv. 5 Nothing.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Ah, I see you enjoy reading upgrade flavor text as well!

I LOVE These Pets.name: I LOVE These Pets
I LOVE These Pets.desc: Get a Breedability VII heart on at least 15 pets within the nest.

Matrix Wickermen.name: Matrix Wickermen
Matrix Wickermen.desc: Accumulate 8760 hours, or an entire year, of Lab AFK time across all players.

Soda Poisoning.name: Soda Poisoning
Soda Poisoning.desc: Beat wave 50 of Clash of Cans with 3 Poisonic Elders at Lv 5 or higher. Also, you can't sell towers.

Channel Surfing.name: Channel Surfing
Channel Surfing.desc: Have a stack of exactly 75,000 TV remotes in your Storage Chest.

Petless.name: Petless
Petless.desc: Trash a total of 2500 pets. How could you be so heartless, so cold...

WOAH That's Fast.name: WOAH That's Fast
WOAH That's Fast.desc: Have a speed of 'Too Fast' displayed while cooking an Eggplant. No this is not a metaphor.

Shiny Shells.name: Shiny Shells
Shiny Shells.desc: Have 6 bronze (or rarer) eggs in your nest at the same time, waiting to be hatched!

Best Plate.name: Best Plate
Best Plate.desc: Upgrade a meal at the Dinner Menu to the point where it gets a void pearl plate!
Best Plate.rewards: -10% lower cost &to upgrade meals &at the Dinner Table

I Like This Pet.name: I Like This Pet
I Like This Pet.desc: Get a Breedability III heart on at least 2 Pets within the nest.

Gilded Shells.name: Gilded Shells
Gilded Shells.desc: Have 12 gold (or rarer) eggs in your nest at the same time, waiting to be hatched!

Cabbage Patch.name: Cabbage Patch
Cabbage Patch.desc: Have 5 kitchens all cooking cabbages at the same time. Remember gamers, eat your vegetables, they ain't so bad!

Barley Lost.name: Barley Lost
Barley Lost.desc: Fail a pet battle with the enemy team having only 5% HP or less. Wait, it's spelled HOW???

desc: Have a stack of exactly 500 Blank Lenses in your Storage Chest. Better complete this before I make it 1,000!
Have a stack of exactly 500 Black Lenses in your Storage Chest. Better complete this before I make it 1,000!
Manually loot 1000 floof poofs, melty cubes, and moustache comb stacks -- ones from AFK claim don't count. You should use Auto for this.
Manually loot 1000 floof poofs, melty cubes, and moustache comb stacks -- AFK claiming doesn't count.

rewards: *5 Book Max LV &*30% Library charge rate

desc: Defeat 5 Giant Mobs of each type Bloque, Mamooth, Snowman, Penguin, & Thermister. Do it in order too, so 5 Bloques first, then 5 mamooths, etc
Defeat 5 Giant Mobs of each type Bloque, Mamooth, Snowman, Penguin, & Thermister. Do it in that monster order.
